input.sentences: when told us his wedding was casual | i was not expecting it to be like this .
we all sat on the floor and watched the ceremony .
we stayed seated for a long time because there was no music to dance to .
the food was a weird vegan creation .
we ate seeds and tap water .
output.sentences: We told them we were expecting a wedding.
They watched and sat on the floor.
They stayed seated for a long time.
